name: 教育研究論文寫作
comment: 教室：教育學院第3會議室
description: 本課程的目的是幫助研究生進行教育研究論文的撰寫，尤其是英文期刊論文的撰寫。本課程的內容包括：評析教育研究論文、教育研究期刊分析、論文審查、論文格式與結構、論文全文撰寫。期望經由本課程的引導，修習本課程的學生能夠讓研究之論文有更好地呈現，甚至將成果發表在國際知名期刊。
goals: 了解論文審查要點與撰寫格式
撰寫教育研究期刊論文
syllabus:
Week 1. Course Introduction.

Week 2. One-to-one meeting (checking the data,research topic, and potential journal).

Week 3. Searching literatures by using relevantdatabases (plus the introduction of some  

         important journals and conferences in thefield).

Week 4. Writing for “Introduction” & “literaturereview.”

Week 5. Basic ideas for conference and journalreview.

Week 6. Experiences for writing and submittingacademic papers to journals.

Week 7.  Academic writing from native Englishproofreader (I)

Week 8. One to one meeting (Introduction &literature review)

Week 9. Academic writing from native Englishproofreader (II)

Week 10.Writing for “Research Method.”

Week 11.Mid-term (Finish research method and revise literature review by this week)

Week 12.One to one meeting (for Research method)

Week 13.Writing for “Results”

Week 14.Writing for “Discussion, conclusion, and implications.”

Week 15.One to one meeting (for Results)

Week 16.Writing a good “Abstract,” peer review, and sharing.

Week 17One to one meeting (for Discussion, conclusion, and implications)

Week18 Final paper submission & discussion.
